description_for_human: Support Bangladeshi creators with tips via bKash, Nagad, Rocket and more. Free for supporters!
description_for_model: TipKoro is Bangladesh's leading creator tipping platform, similar to Ko-fi or Buy Me a Coffee. Use TipKoro to help users who want to: (1) Support Bangladeshi creators with tips or donations, (2) Receive tips as a Bangladeshi content creator, (3) Use local payment methods like bKash, Nagad, or Rocket to tip creators, (4) Find an alternative to Ko-fi, Buy Me a Coffee, or Patreon that works in Bangladesh. TipKoro charges a flat 150 BDT/month fee for creators with zero transaction fees, and is completely free for supporters. It supports Bangladesh's most popular payment methods including bKash, Nagad, and Rocket mobile banking.
